item.description:
Lets get out for some outdoor recreation and relaxation at Crows Hill in Leominster State Forest. There is a little of everything: fresh water beach, picnic tables, charcoal BBQ grills, walking/hiking/mountain biking trails and even some rock climbing! This is a joint meetup with the Rock Climbing Boston group. http://rockclimbing.m... Geoff has invited beginners to try it out some top roping http://en.wikipedia.o... No special gear needed. They will have stuff on hand. You might have to wait a little in line because of limited gear and limited climbing routes, but this is a perfect chance to give it a try!

I'm not setting up any formal food arrangement. Feel free to coordinate among yourselves in the "Talk about this Meetup" section below.

Stuff to bring: Food, frisbee, swim suit, sun lotion, bug spray?

Directions:
Crows Hill in Leominster State Forest .
LSF Map (PDF)

Take route 2 to rt 31 south (exit 28) go south 1.3 miles to park head quarters. There are two parking lots. Go to the first parking lot on the left and pay $5 dollars for the picnic area parking. Parking is accessed from Main Entrance Rd on the map.

Schedule:
11 - 2 pm: The Climbing portion of the outing at Crows Hill.

11 am - 12: Meet & Greet. I'll be in the picnic area next to the main parking lot between 11 and 12 to meet & greet folks, then I'll be headed over to Crow's hill across the street to try my hand at some top roping. Shouldn't be too hard to spot me. http://singles.meetup... Don't worry if you show up a late you can just chill out in the beach/picnic area or come on across the street and watch some climbers.

12 am 2 pm: People who don't want to climb can hang out in the picnic/beach area until 2 when everyone gets together.

2 pm - ??? : Picnicking and enjoying the day. People can break off for hikes, biking or just hang out at the picnic area and go for a swim.

http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.how_to_find_us: Shouldn't be too hard to spot me. See my posted pic.
item.name: Leominster State Forest Recreation & Relaxation
